title: How do you teach empathy? - Jonathan Juravich

options.label: B
options.text: Spending time with their blind grandmother and describing Disney movies to her

options.label: A
options.text: Understanding and sharing the feelings of others

multiple-choice.question: How did the speaker's grandmother's blindness influence their daily life?

options.label: A
options.text: It made them more strict and disciplined

options.label: B

options.label: C
options.text: It required them to maintain a specific order in the house to avoid confusion or harm

options.label: D

options.label: C

options.label: D

options.label: B

options.label: B

options.label: C
options.text: They developed a plan to help rebuild damaged buildings

options.label: D

multiple-choice.question: According to the speaker, what is the importance of teaching empathy to children?

options.label: B

options.label: B
options.text: A warning about the dangers of climate change

options.label: C
options.text: A message of hope for a better future

options.text: A rumor about a new technology

options.label: C

options.label: B

options.label: C

options.label: C

options.label: D

options.label: C

options.label: B

options.label: C
options.text: To criticize social media and its impact on society

options.label: D
options.text: To provide a summary of the poem's main points

options.label: B

options.label: B
options.text: It makes it a strong predator

options.label: C
options.text: It allows it to survive in extreme pressure

multiple-choice.question: Why is the blobfish considered "awesome" despite being called the world's ugliest animal?

options.label: C
options.text: Because its unique body shape allows it to survive in extreme conditions

title: How do ventilators work? - Alex Gendler

options.label: D

multiple-choice.question: What is the main difference between positive pressure ventilation and negative pressure ventilation?

options.label: A
options.text: Positive pressure ventilation uses a facemask, while negative pressure ventilation uses a tube inserted into the trachea

options.label: B
options.text: Positive pressure ventilation pumps air into the lungs, while negative pressure ventilation allows air to be passively drawn in

options.label: C
options.text: Positive pressure ventilation is used for milder cases, while negative pressure ventilation is used for more severe cases

options.label: D
options.text: Positive pressure ventilation is more expensive, while negative pressure ventilation is more portable

options.text: Because it was more portable and allowed for easier access for caregivers

options.label: C
options.text: Because it was less expensive than negative pressure ventilation

options.label: D
options.text: Because it was more comfortable for patients

options.label: C
options.text: It does not require heavy sedation

options.label: D
options.text: It is more comfortable for patients

title: Why can't dogs eat chocolate?

multiple-choice.question: What molecule in chocolate is primarily responsible for making pets sick?

options.label: C
options.text: Increasing heart rate and dilating blood vessels

multiple-choice.question: Why are humans less susceptible to theobromine poisoning compared to pets?

options.label: B
options.text: Humans have a lower body weight

options.label: A

options.text: Humans ate more plants than early cats and dogs

options.label: C
options.text: Humans had a higher body weight than early cats and dogs

options.label: D
options.text: Humans had a lower body weight than early cats and dogs

options.text: Cats process theobromine more quickly than dogs

options.label: D
options.text: Cats have a higher body weight than dogs

options.label: C
options.text: Sweeter chocolates have a higher caffeine content

options.label: D
options.text: Sweeter chocolates have a lower caffeine content

options.label: B
options.text: A quarter of their body weight

options.label: C
options.text: A tenth of their body weight

options.label: D
options.text: A third of their body weight
